attributes.action: Do not shut schools down during the lockdown from 5th Nov 2020 to 2 Dec 2020
attributes.additional_details:
A lot of workers cannot work from home and again will be unable to work, due to lack of childcare. Bringing the nation to a halt yet again.

Keep the schools open as promised on the press conferences, the largely signed petition does not reflect the whole of England
attributes.background:
There has been a petition raised to shut schools down during this second lockdown.

Children have lost enough education this year and a lot of social interaction.  

For the childs education, mental health and well being schools should remain open.

rejection.details:
Schools have not been closed during the current lockdown in England.

If you want the Government to keep all schools and colleges in England open, you might like to sign the following petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558050
